prompt: Subject: Eleven (Chinese female in early 20s) interacting with 'his' gaze. Context: Cozy, intimate indoor setting (e.g., café/bookstore) with soft ambient light. Action: Back to camera, she looks down shyly; slowly lifts head, meets his gaze, small nervous smile forms, and says, 'My name is Eleven.' Style: Warm, romantic, cinematic with soft, slightly desaturated tones. Composition: Close framing transitioning from medium shot to close-up, emphasizing emotional intimacy. Ambiance: Soft, warm ambient indoor light with slightly desaturated palette, conveying nervousness and tenderness.
camera_movement: Slow push-in from over-the-shoulder shot to close-up
